text: Hi Aakash. I remember sabse pehle to hum PHY103 ki class men mile the jab marks diye jaa rahe the...Hum log sab pareshaan the kyunki marks kam aaye the LOL xD. I remember humne image captioning waala project saath men uthaaya tha second sem men...Uss time thoda interaction hua tha lekin zyada nahin kyunki eventually to fraud hi ho gaya tha usmen!! :P. I think hamaari zyadatar baat courses ko hi lekar hui thi kyunki hum donon ko hi branch change karni thi. Baaki to hall bhi same tha isliye baaki waqt bhi milte rehte the...ESC201 ki lab men to bohot maza aaya bro...I'm happy to have met you..Jaise abhi tak chaapa hai, usi tarah aage bhi chaapte rehna...Take care always, Bye!
author: Ali  Faraz

text: Aniket broooo!!! I love you!!! Quiz and exams se pehle tu hi meri aakhri ummeed rehti thi bhai!! We've spent a lot of good times together. Waise ab main electrical core men kaam nahin karne waala. Ab hamaara bhi bharosa uth gaya...LOL!!! Baaki aur kuch bolne ki zaroorat nahin hai. Baat cheet to hoti hi rahegi. Bye and all the best!!!
author: Ali  Faraz

text: Yo Arun!!! I'm happy to have met you and stayed in close touch with you for at least a year. I hope we stay in touch forever. I know that my face or my name keeps popping in your head time and again. So try to message me whenever that happens. We will have a chat!! We've shared so many memories that I don't think I need to say much. All the best for everything!! Bye!!
author: Ali  Faraz

text: Digu broooooo!!!! My life would've been incomplete without you. I don't think I need to say anything. It's all there in our minds. I just wanted to make sure I write this memoir thingy for you. Bye bye!!!
author: Ali  Faraz

text: Rajat brooo...!!! Tere saath to kaafi yaaden hain..Sabse pehle to TA101 men hi mile the...Yaad hai main har assignment ke liye tere room pe aa jaata tha aur discuss karta tha, aur side men Upmanyu chill maar raha hota tha LOL xD. Uske baad to yaar second year men roommate hi ban gaya. Tere saath kuch courses bhi kiye aur kaafi moments share kiye. Mujhe khushi hai ki main tujhse mila. Aise hi mehnat karte rehna aur khoob chaapte rehna...All the best for everything...Take care always, Bye!!
author: Ali  Faraz

text: Debmalyaaa...!!! Taekwondo ke dinon se tujhe jaanta hoon, tu kaafi enthusiastic rehta tha...Aur bhai tujhse zyada confused banda main nahin dekha...1st year men double dassa..Phir electrical le liya..Phir intership ke liye Adobe chala gaya...Aur ab physics men waapas jaana chaahta hai!!! LOL xD. Bhai ye sirf tere sath nahin, sab ke saath hi hota hai. In fact, mere saath bhi hota hai aur abhi ho raha hai...:P. Zyadatar bonding to yaar 1st year men hi hui. Uske baad bas courses men hi baat-cheet hoti thi. Tujhse chaapte dekhkar accha lagta tha...  :) :). Isi tarah hamesha chaapte rehna ...Take care, Bye!!
author: Ali  Faraz

text: Hi Deeksha! Thank you for the memoir. HSS men hi pehle mulaaqaat hui uske baad treasure hunt ki hi thodi memories hai. Uske baad to bas kuch SGs hi batate the HSS ki activities aur unke coordis ke baare men. Mujhe kaafi accha laga tha jab mujhe pata chala ki tum HSS ki coordi ban gayi ho :). Wish you lots of success and happiness. All the best for everything. Take care always, Bye!!
author: Ali  Faraz

text: Hemant brooo...!!! Sabse pehle to Taekwondo men mulaaqaat hui thi jab TKD Demo ke liye humne haan kaha tha. Tab wo khatarnaak TKD bande ke paas (I guess unka naam Santosh tha) jaate the aur demo ki practice karte the. Uske baad to phir CS men hi milna hua. CS men hamaari kaafi acchi bonding rahi. Team men unban hui lekin phir waapis sab ek saath ho gaye. SG interviews se lekar summer men everyday meetings tak, har din tu enthu men dikhta tha. Ye dekhkar kaafi accha lagta tha mujhe. CS ka summer session saath men plan kiya (aur usi waqt tujhse presentation banane ki kala bhi seekh li xD). Deep work waali cheez ko main hamesha ek joke banakar bolta hoon(LOL xD) lekin wo actually ek acchi cheez hai. I'm trying to make it a part of my life (Note, I said trying. Still trying from 2 years. LOL xD). Baaki to yaar teri conversational skills kaafi acchi lagti hai mujhe...ekdum genuine tareeke se aur jolly attitude se baat karta hai tu..Aur ye mujhe kaafi accha lagta hai...Baaki to yaar I wish you all the best for all your future endeavours...Wish you lots of success and happiness..Take care always, Bye!!!
author: Ali  Faraz

text: Hi Karan. Mujhe yaad hai hum log ki sabse pehle dhang se baat MSO202 ki wajah se hui thi jab hum log doubts discuss karte the. Uske pehle bhi maine inferno men tere saath football khela tha lekin shaayad tujhe yaad nahin (aisa tune ek baar bola tha). Aur uss waqt yaani 3rd sem men hum log almost hamesha saath men hi khaana khaate the aur kaafi baat cheet karte the. E-club men winter camp men bhi kaafi time spend kiya tere saath....Yaad hai wo project jo kabhi complete nahin hua( wahi 50% accuracy waala) Hah xD. Aur FIFA ko to bhool hi nahin sakta main...Kaafi maza aata tha yaar. Baaki to yaar TA202 aur MLSP saath men kiya to usi ki yaaden hain. TA202 men to hamaara kaafi jhagda hota tha...Hahahaha xD. Waqt ke saath bonding men bhi changes aate hain. Main bhi yahi hope karta hoon ki aage kabhi kuch common cheez aa jaaye aur waapis bonding waisi hi ho jaaye. Tu mera accha dost tha aur hamesha rahega...Thank you for everything... Take care always and Bye!!!
author: Ali  Faraz

text: One of my very good friends jisko main mess men dekhke bohot khush ho jaata tha chaahe jitni bhi tension ho! You are an awesome guy! Main tujhe bohot zyada lecture deta rehta tha...Kabhi kabhi teri help karne ki koshish ki thi (I remember ESC101) ...Wo alag baat hai tumhaari help kabhi ho hi nahin pati thi LOL!!!..Uske alawa we've spent some good times together...like events ground in festivals...etc. Baaki aur kuch yaad nahin aa raha...Bye and All the best!!!
author: Ali  Faraz

text: Dipak brooo... Yaar mujhe nahin lagta main likhunga bhi to tu 20 saal baad in memoirs ko padhega...Kyunki 92nd memoir tak aate-aate tu already so chuka hoga!!! LOL :P. Bro, CS se pehle to mulaaqaat nahin hui. CS men hi aakar aapke jalwe dekhne ko mile. General knowledge, Tech knowledge, bla-bla knowledge, mujhe pata rehta hai ki agar tujhse poochunga to tu kuch na kuch to bata hi dega. Baaki bro I'm very happy to have met you. I have this gut feeling that we will cross roads in future...Let's hope for the best xD. Mr. Meme Lord, keep spreading the positive vibes that you always do...All the best for everything...Take care always, Bye!
author: Ali  Faraz

text: Yaar tere bina meri life incomplete reh jaati. Thanks for giving the awesome company during the first year....First year men kaafi acche pal guzaare the saath men...phir baad men kuch aur courses men saath men rahe...Uske alawa to zyada baat nahin ho paayi lekin maine tujhe kabhi nahin bhoola ....Aur kabhi bhi nahin bhuloonga...You are awesome bro...All the best for everything!! Take care, bye!
author: Ali  Faraz

text: Piyush bro, kya haal hai?? We have spent some good times together in the first year...Uske baad zyada baat cheet nahin ho paayi although same branch men the, pata nahin kyun...Anyway, Mujhe khushi hai ki main tumse mila apni zindagi men. Every person has a role to play in one's life. You have also played an important role, at least for a year. Thank you for everything! Take care, bye!!
author: Ali  Faraz

text: Hi Prateek. Bro, hum log mere khayaal se class men hi mile the kyunki tu bohot doubts poochta tha (har class ke baad teacher ke peeche-peeche)...aur phir main tere saath kuch-kuch discuss karta tha. Tune bhi branch change kari, acchi laga dekhkar. Teri mehnat dekhne men aati thi. Aise hi zindagi men accha karte rehna. I hope hum log kabhi future men milen aur acche se baat kar paayen!! All the best for everything!! Take care, Bye!
author: Ali  Faraz

text: Hi Sagnik!!! Hamaari sabse pehle CS men hi mulaaqaat hui. Summer mein saara kaam saath men kiya...High Tea, Web, DoSA office, DoAA office, bla-bla...aur pata nahin kya kuch...CS men kaafi saari memorable moments share kiye..I remember hum donon coordis ke saath meeting kar rahe the aur main uss waqt kaafi tensed tha, Kaafi ajeeb moment tha wo, uss waqt tune support kiya tha...Baaki during the tenure you kept supporting me...I'm grateful for that. Aur kabhi-kabhi humne jhagda bhi kiya...xD. CS ke alawa courses men in touch rahe. Assignments, Labs, wagaira men baat-cheet hoti rehti thi. Last men bas yahi kahoonga ki mujhe khushi hai ki main tujhse mila. Jis tarah chaapte rahe ho waise hi chaapte rehna...All the best for everything...Take care always, Bye!!
author: Ali  Faraz

text: "Oh hum-dum soniyo re....jaaniya re...chori-chori...", ..."Khaana khaa liye...". Aur yaad nahin aa raha bro. Meri jaankaari men tu ek lauta banda hai jise 4 branches ka experience hai (Mechanical, BSBE, Eco aur ab MTH)!!!! Subah-subah yoga karte the to mujhe accha lagta tha (Yaad hai na, Main hi tumhe uthaata tha..:P) MSO203, MSO201, phir Psychology saath men kiya. Kaafi kuch common cheezen thi. Arre shuruaat men main jab tumhaare room aaya tha to mujhe laga tha ki tum bhi mujhe baahar nikaldoge LOL xD Lekin tum acche insaan nikle :P. 3rd sem, winter, 4th sem, summer...Baap re...Kitna time saath men rahe. Bro, tujhse milkar bohot khushi mili. Tere saath kaafi acche moments spend kiye hain. Abhi to hamaara ek aur saal hai, Milenge zaroor, In-Sha-Allah. Take care always, Bye!
author: Ali  Faraz

text: Hi Snehal bro!! Meri previous wing men tu un chand logon men se hai jisse main abhi tak touch men hoon. Tu productivity ke baare men kaafi passionate rehta hai aur ye dekhkar main kaafi inspire hota hoon. You value your time a lot (I remember you said..."Ye khaana khaana kitna unproductive hai...it doesn't add any value to my life..." ....LOL xD). Tu in general acchi baaton(ethical/moral) men interest leta hai aur yeh bhi dekhkar mujhe bohot accha lagta hai. Mujhe yaad hai main ek baar mess men tujhe religious cheezen bata raha tha aur tu bohot interested tha, yahan tak ki main tere room tak tujhe baaten batata raha. Teri iss open-mindedness ko dekhkar bhi mujhe bohot accha laga tha. Baaki to yaar kuch courses common rahe to usi men interaction hua. Jis tarah se ab tak chaapte rahe ho, waise hi aage bhi chaapte rehna...Wish you lots of success and happiness in this life and the next!! Take care always, Bye!!!
author: Ali  Faraz

text: Sohail bro...Kota ke dinon se apan ki dosti hai...Tab se dil men basa hua hai tu, Aur hamesha basa rahega. IITK men zyada baat-cheet nahin ho paayi due to various reasons...lekin koi baat nahin ab ho jaayegi.. Mujhe lagta hai ki hum log aage bhi kaafi connected rahenge,In-Sha-Allah, isliye zyada kuch likh nahin raha...Apna khayaal rakhna bro, Wish you lots of success and happiness in this world and the next!!! Bye-bye!!
author: Ali  Faraz

text: Tanishq broooo....!!! CS se pehle to main tujhe nahin jaanta tha...CS men hi mulaaqaat hui aur kaafi acchi dosti hui (at least mujhe to aisa hi lagta hai...) Tere saath kaafi saare moments hain isliye bayaan karna mushkil hai thoda...Tere mehnat ko dekhkar main kaafi inspire hota tha...Tune team men jo trust build up kiya tha wo kaafi mind-blowing tha. Baaki to yaar EE ke bande the hum log...uski bhi kuch yaaden hain...I hope hum log aage bhi milen...All the best for everything...Take care and Bye!
author: Ali  Faraz

text: Vipin Brooooooo....Love you from the bottom of my heart. We have spent some really good times together and I will never forget those moments. I think you are one of the very few persons who can understand whether I am in stress or not....warna meri smile ko dekhkar to sabko yahi lagta tha ki sab chill hai...Aur zyadatar sab chill rehta bhi hai lekin kabhi kabhi dikkat ho jaati hai...Aur un moments men tu mere saath rehta hai and I love you for that!!! Main tere touch men hamesha rahoonga, In-Sha-Allah, isliye zyada kuch likh nahin raha...Okay cool, Take care always, Bye!!!
author: Ali  Faraz

text: Vishesh brooo...Mere khayaal se hamaari first year men hi baat cheet hoti thi...mujhe yaad hai PHY101 lab se related main doubts poochne aaya tha...aur phir second year men to mainn tumhaara wingie hi ban gaya. Phir to bas shuruaat ho gayi...ESC201, MSO202/203, ESO203(tumhaara favourite :P), aur sabse ahem TA202!! Jismen saara kaam mechanical waalon ne kiya Hahaha xD. Uske baad to apan roommates hi ban gaye. Kaafi moments share kiye the humne. Yaar tere alarm ne mujhe bohot pareshaan kiya... Sorry for those claps for waking you up (I hope you remember this Hahahaha xD). Yaar you were a very good roommate. Mujhe yaad hai main jab lame jokes maarta tha to tu kehta tha...."Waaahhh...Kya baaaat hai *Claps*","Yeh kya zeher hai bhai... mere kaan phatne waale hain...maine ye suna hi kyun.." etc. etc. Aur ye sab reaction bhoolkar tu khud hi baad men lame jokes maarta tha *Facepalm* Hahahhaha xD. Arre tujhe yaad hai wo kutta jo bed ki neeche chup gaya tha!!! Uske baad se main hamesha bed ke neeche check karne laga Hahaha xD.  Bro I'm glad I had you as my roommate...I hope maine bhi tujhe acchi company di...Thank you for all the cooperation and support...Take care always and Bye!
author: Ali  Faraz
